item.title: Go Awesome
item.description: Some summary of go awesome projects, personally recommend: JSON jsoniter A high-performance 100% compatible drop-in replacement of "encoding/json". [Github] [Homepage] HTTP Request GoRequest GoRequest -- Simplified HTTP client ( inspired by nodejs SuperAgent ) [Github] [Homepage]
